note:
Musician and the Creator of Beacon Light podcast, where I read Solarpunk short stories to explore and promote the genre. New episodes on Mondays. Authors can submit their stories to beaconlightpod-at-gmail-dot-com

An absurdist nerd who tweets about neurodivergence, Solarpunk, politics, and occasionally pro wrestling. Pronouns Any/all
I like to get weird conceptually. 1312
